channel.title: Graphic's Shop
channel.description:
Well its not really a shop im not selling any graphic's but ill make some for free im very talented and i just wanna get a deviant art folder going so i want to make a few GFX for people.
If this is not allowed please let me know and i will remove it, it does not say anywhere in the rule's that it isn't aloud so ye :D.
To get your graphic's you must fill this form out
[code] Theme: Color 1: Color 2: Text(anything you want it to say): Text color: Additional effets to text or picture: Other info: [/code]

item.title: Graphic's Shop
item.dc:creator: @Demolitionx711 Demolitionx711
item.description:
@Demolitionx711 wrote:

Theme: People pking preferably all special attacks going in the backround
Color 1: Blue
Color 2: Black interchangable with color 1 idc…
Text(anything you want it to say): Demolitionx Where Pkers Can Unite.

Text color: Black trim blue inside
Additional effets to text or picture: Just moving specs… Animated please.
